TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当公开虚拟模式下的 的新区域并且 确定需要新范围的项时，将发生 事件。The event occurs when a new area of a in virtual mode is exposed and the determines a new range of items is needed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ListView1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#465)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#465)]

Public Sub New (startIndex As Integer, endIndex As Integer)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 所需的一组项的起始索引，这些项用于下次发生的 事件。

span.span: The starting index of a range of items needed by the for the next event that occurs.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: 所需的一组项的结束索引，这些项用于下次发生的 事件。

span.span: The ending index of a range of items needed by the for the next event that occurs.

summary.span: 使用指定的起始索引和结束索引初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified starting and ending indices.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndIndex As Integer
public: property int EndIndex { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取处于虚拟模式的 控件所需的一组值的结束索引。

span.span: Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a control in virtual mode.

value.span: 控件所需的一组值的结束索引。

span.span: The index at the end of the range of values needed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 属性指定的值的范围表示虚拟 控件在下一次发生 事件时最有可能需要的值的范围。The range of values specified by the and properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual control for the next occurrence of a event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `ListView1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
